scripts.dev:native: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider NODE_ENV=development nodemon server/index.js --watch server
scripts.dev:native:redis: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider REDIS_URL=redis://localhost:6379 NODE_ENV=development nodemon server/index.js --watch server
scripts.dev:rebuild: docker compose down && docker compose up --build
scripts.dev:node18: docker run -it --rm -v $(pwd):/app -w /app -p 3000:3000 -e REDIS_URL=redis://host.docker.internal:6379 node:18-alpine sh -c 'npm install && npm run dev:native'
scripts.docker:clean: docker compose down -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.test:build: docker compose run --rm test npm run build
scripts.test:redis: docker compose run --rm test node scripts/test-redis.js
